definitions.definition: Having a valence of 2 ; having two ligands
definitions.label_groups: inorganic chemistry , organic chemistry , physical chemistry

definitions.definition: Of, or relating to a pair of homologous synapsed chromosomes that occur during meiosis .

main_definition: ( inorganic chemistry , organic chemistry , physical chemistry ) Having a valence of 2 ; having two ligands
secondary_definitions: ( genetics ) Of, or relating to a pair of homologous synapsed chromosomes that occur during meiosis .
( of a vaccine ) Protecting against two different viruses.
